Samurai

Samurai, the fiery ginger warrior, joined the household with a legendary origin story—having faced down two Huskies before her rescue by neighborly heroes. This fearless feline brings vibrant energy to our home, with a mischievous spirit that finds particular joy in stalking Miss Peregrine through windows, much to the elder cat's dismay. Despite her fierce reputation, Samurai melts at the promise of a good scratch, frequently interrupting coding sessions by leaping onto my desk to demand immediate attention and cuddles. Her sudden keyboard inspections might seem like affection, but perhaps she's actually conducting rigorous code reviews, her amber eyes scanning for bugs with the same intensity she once faced down those canine adversaries. Equal parts tenacious fighter and loving companion, Samurai proves daily that the smallest packages often contain the boldest spirits.

Caretaker

Schalk Neethling
